original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'am /
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'am /
translated: or among the gods of the Heaven of the Four Great Kings,

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'am /🔽mtshe ma'i lha'am /🔽dga' ldan gyi lha'am /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'am / mtshe ma'i lha'am / dga' ldan gyi lha'am /
translated: the Heaven of the Thirty-Three,🔽the Yāma Heaven,🔽the Tuṣita Heaven,

original: 'phrul dga'i lha'am /
analyzed: 'phrul dga'i lha'am /
translated: the Heaven of Delighting in Emanations,

original: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byung ste /
analyzed: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byung ste /
translated: or the Heaven of Making Use of Others’ Emanations. They will experience the perfect happiness of humans and gods, and through those very roots of virtue, they will reach the end of suffering.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni /
translated: The result of worshiping the relics of the Thus-Gone One

original: de tsam du bas kyi /
analyzed: de tsam du bas kyi /
translated: is not limited to that.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / bklags shing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / bklags shing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na /
translated: read it aloud, and master it, and if they properly pay attention to it,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will complete the perfection of meditative absorption.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will complete the perfection of perseverance.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will complete the perfection of patience.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will complete the perfection of moral discipline.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will complete the perfection of generosity.

original: nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽phyi stong pa nyid @484a *//
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // phyi stong pa nyid @484a *//
translated: They will complete inner emptiness.

original: yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will complete outer emptiness.🔽They will complete inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will complete the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the great will be completed,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the ultimate will be completed,🔽the emptiness of the conditioned will be completed,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned will be completed,🔽the emptiness of what is beyond extremes will be completed,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless will be completed,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of non-rejection will be completed,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence will be completed,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena will be completed,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of specific characteristics will be completed,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the emptiness of non-apprehension will be completed.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.🔽They will perfect the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the four right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the four legs of magical emanation,🔽the five faculties,

original: stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the five powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the seven branches of enlightenment,

original: 'phags @484b pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags @484b pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro /
translated: They will perfect the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the four formless concentrations,🔽and the four immeasurables.

original: tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the four immeasurables will be perfected;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the four formless absorptions will be perfected;

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the eight liberations will be perfected;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the nine serial absorptions will be perfected;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation will be perfected;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the clairvoyances will be perfected;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the meditative stabilities will be perfected;

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways will be perfected;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas will be perfected;

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the four fearlessnesses will be perfected;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the four detailed and thorough knowledges will be perfected.

original: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and will perfect great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'des pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'des pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will perfect the eighteen unshared qualities of the Buddha.

original: de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will intentionally take on bodies.

original: lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te /🔽'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam /
analyzed: lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te / 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam /
translated: And with those bodies they will bring sentient beings to maturity.🔽They will take on the bodies of universal monarchs,

original: rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am /
analyzed: rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am /
translated: of those of the highest caste,🔽of brahmins,

original: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am /🔽khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes bu'i lus sam /🔽@485a *// brgya byin gyi gzugs sam /🔽tshangs pa'i gzugs sam /
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes bu'i lus sam / @485a *// brgya byin gyi gzugs sam / tshangs pa'i gzugs sam /
translated: of householders,🔽of Śakra,🔽of Brahmā,

original: ngal bso po'i gzugs kyang rung ste /
analyzed: ngal bso po'i gzugs kyang rung ste /
translated: or of Nārāyaṇa.

original: lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro //
translated: And with those bodies they will bring sentient beings to maturity.

original: nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will transcend the level of the śrāvakas and the level of the pratyekabuddhas and will enter into the secure state of a bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having entered into the faultlessness of a bodhisattva, they will attain the bodhisattvas’ superknowledges.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having attained the bodhisattvas’ superknowledges, they will travel from buddhafield to buddhafield.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: therefore

original: bdag ni / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa'ang ma lags /🔽glo ba ma ches pa'ang ma mchis /
analyzed: bdag ni / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa'ang ma lags / glo ba ma ches pa'ang ma mchis /
translated: I am not disrespectful to the tathāgatas’ relics,🔽I am not unconvinced,

original: mchod par mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags /
analyzed: mchod par mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags /
translated: I am not unwilling to worship them,

original: gzung bar mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags te /
analyzed: gzung bar mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags te /
translated: I am not unwilling to take them up.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /🔽rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni / rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis na /
translated: this perfection of wisdom🔽is the cause of all the buddhadharmas that sons of good family or

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bsags pa lags /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bsags pa lags /
translated: daughters of good family who worship, revere, honor, and make offerings to it will accumulate.

original: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la'ang /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la'ang /
translated: and all that is excellent will be attained.🔽And they will also honor,

original: rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro //
translated: revere, respect, and make offerings to the relics of the Tathāgata.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig @485b rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang chos kyi sku dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig @485b rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang chos kyi sku dang /
translated: further, as many tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas as there are in the world systems of the ten directions, however many there are, however many there will be, and however many there are now, who are alive, live, and will live, and who teach the Dharma, they too, by seeing the Dharma body,

original: gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing mchod par 'tshal bas /
analyzed: gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing mchod par 'tshal bas /
translated: the form body, and the wisdom body, and by wishing to make offerings,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi /
translated: should take up this perfection of wisdom,

original: bcang bar bgyi /
analyzed: bcang bar bgyi /
translated: they should bear it in mind,

original: bklag par bgyi /
analyzed: bklag par bgyi /
translated: they should read it,

original: kun chub par bgyi /
analyzed: kun chub par bgyi /
translated: they should master it,

original: mchod par bgyi /
analyzed: mchod par bgyi /
translated: they should make offerings to it,

original: gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi /
analyzed: gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi /
translated: and they should teach it widely to others.

original: tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ste /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ste /
translated: and properly bring to mind.

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni /
translated: That son of a good family or daughter of a good family

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will see the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas in the world systems of the ten directions that are innumerable and limitless.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o //
translated: that son of a good family or daughter of a good family practicing the perfection of wisdom should cultivate the mindfulness of the Buddha in terms of reality.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas /
analyzed: gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas /
translated: further, that son of a good family or daughter of a good family who wants to see those tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bgyi /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bgyi /
translated: should take up this perfection of wisdom,

original: bcang bar bgyi /🔽bklag par bgyi /
analyzed: bcang bar bgyi / bklag par bgyi /
translated: should bear it in mind,🔽should read it aloud,

original: kun chub par bgyi /
analyzed: kun chub par bgyi /
translated: should master it,

original: mchod par bgyi /
analyzed: mchod par bgyi /
translated: and should make offerings to it.

original: gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi /
analyzed: gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi /
translated: and to teach it extensively to others.

original: chos nyid tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi'o //
analyzed: chos nyid tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi'o //
translated: We will properly keep in mind the nature of reality.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gnyis po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: gnyis po 'di dag ni /
translated: these two

original: chos nyid de /
analyzed: chos nyid de /
translated: are the nature of reality.

original: @486a *// gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: @486a *// gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: What are the two?

original: 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid do //
analyzed: 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid do //
translated: The nature of reality of conditioned phenomena and the nature of reality of unconditioned phenomena.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de la 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na /
analyzed: de la 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na /
translated: what is the nature of reality of conditioned phenomena?

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
translated: The wisdom of inner emptiness, the wisdom of outer emptiness, the wisdom of outer and inner emptiness, the wisdom of the emptiness of emptiness, the wisdom of great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
translated: the wisdom of the emptiness of the ultimate, the wisdom of the emptiness of the conditioned, the wisdom of the emptiness of the unconditioned, the wisdom of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the wisdom of the emptiness of what is without beginning or end,🔽the wisdom of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the wisdom of the emptiness of nature, the wisdom of the emptiness of all phenomena, the wisdom of the emptiness of defining characteristics, the wisdom of the emptiness of what is not to be perceived,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /
translated: the wisdom of the emptiness of non-entities, the wisdom of the emptiness of essence, the wisdom of the emptiness of the essence of non-entities, the wisdom of the four applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang / stobs lnga'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang / stobs lnga'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang /
translated: the wisdom of the four right efforts, the wisdom of the four legs of manifestation, the wisdom of the five faculties, the wisdom of the five powers, the wisdom of the seven branches of enlightenment, the wisdom of the eightfold path of the noble ones,

original: @486b 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i ye shes dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang /
analyzed: @486b 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i ye shes dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang /
translated: the wisdom of the four noble truths, the wisdom of the four concentrations, the wisdom of the four immeasurables, the wisdom of the four formless absorptions, the wisdom of the eight aspects of liberation, the wisdom of the nine serial absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang /
translated: the wisdom of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation, the wisdom of the five higher perceptions, the wisdom of all meditative stabilities, the wisdom of all dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang /
translated: the wisdom of the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the wisdom of the four fearlessnesses, the wisdom of the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the wisdom of great compassion, and the wisdom of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,

original: dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /
translated: the wisdom of virtuous phenomena, the wisdom of nonvirtuous phenomena, the wisdom of contaminated phenomena, the wisdom of uncontaminated phenomena, the wisdom of mundane phenomena,🔽and

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni /
translated: The wisdom of the supramundane dharmas is

original: 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o //
translated: the dharmatā of the conditioned dharmas.

original: de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na /
analyzed: de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na /
translated: What is the dharmatā of the unconditioned dharmas?

original: de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / @487a *//
analyzed: de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / @487a *//
translated: It is that which has no arising, no ceasing, no abiding, no change into something else, no defilement,

original: rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib ba ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib ba ma mchis pa ste /
translated: no purification, no increase, and no decrease.

original: de ni / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de ni / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: That is the intrinsic nature of all dharmas.

original: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na /
translated: What is the intrinsic nature of all dharmas?

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: All dharmas

original: dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: are the intrinsic nature of non-entity.

original: de ni / 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o //
analyzed: de ni / 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o //
translated: That is called the dharmatā of the unconditioned dharmas.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: koo shi ka de de bzhin no //
analyzed: koo shi ka de de bzhin no //
translated: “Kauśika, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
analyzed: 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
translated: Those tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas of the past who have appeared, they too, having relied on just this perfection of wisdom,

original: tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
translated: Those tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas of the future who will appear, they too, having relied on just this perfection of wisdom,

original: chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: And all the Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Buddhas who are now present, alive, and well in immeasurable and incalculable world systems in the ten directions, who are teaching the Dharma, they too have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by relying on this very perfection of wisdom.

original: 'das @487b pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyad cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang /
analyzed: 'das @487b pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyad cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang /
translated: And all the śrāvakas who have appeared of the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly awakened buddhas of the past, and all the śrāvakas who will appear of the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly awakened buddhas of the future,

original: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu🔽thob bo / thob bo /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo / thob bo /
translated: the result of stream enterer,

original: 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: to attain, and will attain

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo /
translated: the result of once-returner,

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: to attain, and will attain

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo /
translated: the result of non-returner,

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: to attain, and will attain

original: dgra bcom pa nyid thob po /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob po /
translated: the state of a worthy one,

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: to attain, and will attain

original: 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te rang byang chub thob bo /
analyzed: 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te rang byang chub thob bo /
translated: All the pratyekabuddhas of the past, all the pratyekabuddhas of the future, and all the pratyekabuddhas who are present in infinite and countless world systems in the ten directions have attained their pratyekabuddha enlightenment by relying on this very perfection of wisdom.🔽

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: All the pratyekabuddhas of the past, all the pratyekabuddhas of the future, and all the pratyekabuddhas of the present who are present in infinite, countless world systems have attained, will attain, and are attaining their pratyekabuddha awakening on the basis of this very perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
translated: Because in this perfection of wisdom the three vehicles are taught in detail,

original: de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa @488a *//
analyzed: de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa @488a *//
translated: and they are taught in the manner of signlessness, the manner of objectlessness, the manner of nonproduction, the manner of nonstopping,

original: med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang / len pa med pa'i tshul dang / 'dor ba med pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba med pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang / len pa med pa'i tshul dang / 'dor ba med pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba med pa'i tshul dang /
translated: It is taught by the way of non-existence, the way of non-affliction, the way of non-purification, the way of non-conditioning, the way of non-appropriation, the way of non-rejection, the way of non-depletion,

original: bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang / blang ba med pa'i tshul dang / spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te /
analyzed: bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang / blang ba med pa'i tshul dang / spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te /
translated: the way of non-addition, the way of non-acceptance, and the way of non-rejection.

original: de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi /
analyzed: de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi /
translated: Moreover, it is taught by the way of worldly conventions,

translated: but not by the ultimate.

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /

analyzed: ring du song ba ma yin /

translated: It is not nonvirtuous.🔽It is not past.🔽It is not future.

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /

original: pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste /
translated: is a great perfection.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni /

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'ang 'tshal te / sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: sems can du gdags par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can du gdags par dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: no reference to a sentient being,

original: srog tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽'gro bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: srog tu dmigs pa ma mchis so // 'gro bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: no reference to a life-force,🔽no reference to a human being,🔽no reference to a person,

original: gso bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽skyes bur dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽gang zag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: gso bar dmigs pa ma mchis so // skyes bur dmigs pa ma mchis so // gang zag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: no reference to an individual,🔽no reference to a human,

analyzed: shed can du dmigs pa ma mchis so // shed bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //

analyzed: byed pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: tshor ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshor ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: shes pa bor dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: shes pa bor dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: no reference to a knower,

original: mthong ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mthong ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so //

analyzed: @489a *// gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so // tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: 'du shes su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'du shes su dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: mig tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mig tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: rna bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rna bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: no reference to the ears,

original: snar dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: snar dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the nose is non-apprehensible,

original: lcer dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lcer dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the tongue is non-apprehensible,

original: lus su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lus su dmigs pa ma mchis so //

analyzed: yid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so //

analyzed: sgrar dmigs pa ma mchis so // drir dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: sounds are non-apprehensible,🔽smells are non-apprehensible,

analyzed: ror dmigs pa ma mchis so //

analyzed: reg tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: chos su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: chos su dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so // sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: tongue consciousness is non-apprehensible,

analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the tongue sense-sphere is non-apprehensible,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the body sense-sphere is non-apprehensible,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma @489b mchis so //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma @489b mchis so // mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so /

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //

translated: the sense-sphere of sounds is non-apprehensible,🔽the sense-sphere of smells is non-apprehensible,🔽the sense-sphere of tastes is non-apprehensible,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽sa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so // sa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
