original: chu'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: chu'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the water element is non-apprehensible,

original: me'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽rlung gi khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: me'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so // rlung gi khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the fire element is non-apprehensible,🔽the wind element is non-apprehensible,

original: nam mkha'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so // rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the space element is non-apprehensible,🔽and the consciousness element is non-apprehensible.

original: ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: Ignorance is non-apprehensible,

original: 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: volitional factors are non-apprehensible,

original: rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: consciousness is non-apprehensible,

original: ming dang gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: name and form are non-apprehensible,

original: skye mched drug tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: skye mched drug tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the six sense fields are non-apprehensible,

original: reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: contact is non-apprehensible,

original: tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽sred par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so // sred par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: feeling is non-apprehensible,🔽craving is non-apprehensible,

original: len par dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽srid par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: len par dmigs pa ma mchis so // srid par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: grasping is non-apprehensible,🔽becoming is non-apprehensible,

original: skye bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: skye bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: birth is non-apprehensible,

original: rga shir dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rga shir dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: and aging and death are non-apprehensible.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: The perfection of giving is non-apprehensible,

original: tshul khrims @490a *//
analyzed: tshul khrims @490a *//
translated: the perfection of morality is non-apprehensible,

original: kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the perfection of patience is non-apprehensible,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin bar dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the perfection of perseverance is non-apprehensible,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the perfection of concentration is non-apprehensible,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so // nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so // phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom is non-apprehensible.🔽Inner emptiness is non-apprehensible,🔽outer emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: inner and outer emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: emptiness of emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: great emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so // 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: ultimate emptiness is non-apprehensible,🔽conditioned emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: unconditioned emptiness is non-apprehensible,🔽and emptiness that is the nonapprehension of anything whatsoever is non-apprehensible.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,🔽the emptiness of all phenomena,🔽the emptiness of defining characteristics,🔽the emptiness of nonobservation,🔽the emptiness of an intrinsic nature,🔽and the emptiness of the nonexistence of things.🔽They do not apprehend the emptiness of the unlimited as the unlimited.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: They do not apprehend the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end as that which has neither beginning nor end.🔽They do not apprehend the emptiness of nonrejection as nonrejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: They do not apprehend the emptiness of a basic nature as a basic nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: They do not apprehend the emptiness of all phenomena as all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: They do not apprehend the emptiness of its own specific characteristics as its own specific characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: They do not apprehend the emptiness of nonapprehension as nonapprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: They do not apprehend the emptiness of nonthings as nonthings.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: They do not apprehend the emptiness of an intrinsic nature as an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis @490b so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis @490b so //
translated: They do not apprehend the emptiness of the nonexistence of things as the nonexistence of things.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: They do not apprehend the applications of mindfulness as the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: They do not apprehend the right efforts as the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the bases of supernatural powers are non-apprehensible,

original: dbang po rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: dbang po rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the faculties are non-apprehensible,

original: stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the powers are non-apprehensible,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the branches of enlightenment are non-apprehensible,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the noble eightfold path is non-apprehensible,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the noble truths are non-apprehensible,

original: bsam gtan rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the meditative stabilities are non-apprehensible,

original: tshad med pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the immeasurable practices are non-apprehensible,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the formless absorptions are non-apprehensible,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the eight deliverances are non-apprehensible,

original: mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the nine serial steps of meditative absorption are non-apprehensible,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: and the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation are non-apprehensible.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the superknowledges are non-apprehensible,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the meditative stabilities are non-apprehensible,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are non-apprehensible,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas are non-apprehensible,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges are non-apprehensible,

original: snying rje chen por dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: snying rje chen por dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: great compassion is non-apprehensible,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so //🔽rgyun du zhugs @491a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so // rgyun du zhugs @491a *//
translated: and the distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible.

original: pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: “The result of stream enterer is non-apprehensible,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the result of once-returner is non-apprehensible,🔽the result of non-returner is non-apprehensible,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so; ;dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so; ;dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the state of a worthy one is non-apprehensible,

original: rang byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: and a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is non-apprehensible.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects is not apprehended,

original: byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: awakening is not apprehended,

original: sangs rgyas su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas su dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: a buddha is not apprehended,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te /
translated: and the qualities of a buddha are not apprehended.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom

original: dmigs pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so //
translated: does not stand as an object.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de ni / 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so //
translated: it is because it does not have the intrinsic nature that would apprehend something, that would apprehend in something, or that would apprehend somewhere.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: koo shi ka /🔽de de bzhin no /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de de bzhin no /
translated: “Kauśika,🔽it is so,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is just as you have said.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi dmigs pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyod pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi dmigs pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyod pas /
translated: Because bodhisattva great beings who have practiced the perfection of wisdom for a long time do so without apprehending anything.

original: des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since they do not apprehend awakening,

original: sangs rgyas lta ci smos /
analyzed: sangs rgyas lta ci smos /
translated: not to speak of buddhahood,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos lta'ang ci smos /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos lta'ang ci smos /
translated: not to speak of the qualities of a buddha.

original: brgya byin gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: brgya byin gyis gsol pa /
translated: Śakra said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyi /
translated: do bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la mi spyod dam /
analyzed: de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la mi spyod dam /
translated: or do they not practice the other perfections?

original: bcom ldan @491b 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan @491b 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: bodhisattva great beings

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po kun la'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po kun la'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de /
translated: practice all six perfections without apprehending anything.

original: des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs gtong ba'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs gtong ba'ang mi dmigs /
translated: They do not apprehend generosity, nor do they apprehend giving,

original: len pa'ang mi dmigs so //🔽tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: len pa'ang mi dmigs so // tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend receiving.🔽They do not apprehend morality,

original: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend those who have morality,

original: tshul khrims ngan pa'ang mi dmigs so //🔽bzod pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pa'ang mi dmigs so // bzod pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend immorality.🔽They do not apprehend patience,

original: bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend those who have patience,

original: gnod sems kyang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gnod sems kyang mi dmigs so //
translated: nor do they apprehend malice.

original: brtson 'grus kyang ma dmigs /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyang ma dmigs /
translated: He does not apprehend effort.

original: brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: He does not apprehend one who possesses effort.

original: le lo'ang mi dmigs so //🔽bsam gtan yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: le lo'ang mi dmigs so // bsam gtan yang mi dmigs /
translated: He does not apprehend laziness.🔽He does not apprehend concentration.

original: bsam gtan dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: He does not apprehend one who possesses concentration.

original: 'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend distraction.

original: shes rab kyang mi dmigs /🔽shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: shes rab kyang mi dmigs / shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: He does not apprehend wisdom.🔽He does not apprehend one who possesses wisdom.

original: shes rab 'chal pa'ang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab 'chal pa'ang mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend bad wisdom.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: nevertheless, the perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: is the way of not apprehending form, the way of not apprehending feeling, the way of not apprehending perception, the way of not apprehending volitional factors, the way of not apprehending consciousness, the way of not apprehending the eyes, the way of not apprehending the ears,

original: sna mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / @492a *//🔽dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: sna mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / @492a *// dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way the nose is not apprehended, the way the tongue is not apprehended, the way the body is not apprehended, the way the mind is not apprehended, the way form is not apprehended, the way sound is not apprehended,🔽the way smell is not apprehended, the way taste is not apprehended, the way texture is not apprehended, the way mental phenomena are not apprehended, the way eye consciousness is not apprehended, the way ear consciousness is not apprehended,

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way nose consciousness is not apprehended, the way tongue consciousness is not apprehended, the way body consciousness is not apprehended, the way mind consciousness is not apprehended, the way eye contact is not apprehended,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way the composite of ear contact is non-apprehensible, the way the composite of nose contact is non-apprehensible, the way the composite of tongue contact is non-apprehensible, the way the composite of body contact is non-apprehensible, and the way the composite of thought contact is non-apprehensible.🔽the way the feeling that arises from the composite of eye contact is non-apprehensible, the way the feeling that arises from the composite of ear contact is non-apprehensible, the way the feeling that arises from the composite of nose contact is non-apprehensible,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung pa'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung pa'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way the feeling that arises from the composite of tongue contact is non-apprehensible, the way the feeling that arises from the composite of body contact is non-apprehensible, and the way the feeling that arises from the composite of thought contact is non-apprehensible.

original: sa'i khams mi dmigs @492b pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: sa'i khams mi dmigs @492b pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way the earth element is non-apprehensible, the way the water element is non-apprehensible, the way the fire element is non-apprehensible, the way the wind element is non-apprehensible, the way the space element is non-apprehensible, and the way the consciousness element is non-apprehensible;🔽the way ignorance is non-apprehensible, the way volitional factors are non-apprehensible, the way consciousness is non-apprehensible, the way name and form are non-apprehensible, the way the six sense fields are non-apprehensible, the way contact is non-apprehensible,

original: ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way feeling is non-apprehensible, the way craving is non-apprehensible, the way appropriation is non-apprehensible, the way existence is non-apprehensible, the way birth is non-apprehensible, the way aging and death are non-apprehensible,

original: tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of feeling, the non-apprehension of craving, the non-apprehension of appropriation, the non-apprehension of existence, the non-apprehension of birth, the non-apprehension of old age and death, the non-apprehension of the perfection of generosity,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the perfection of conduct, the non-apprehension of the perfection of patience, the non-apprehension of the perfection of diligence, the non-apprehension of the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: emptiness of emptiness, the way of nonapprehending;

original: chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don @493a *//
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don @493a *//
translated: great emptiness, the way of nonapprehending;🔽ultimate emptiness, the way of nonapprehending;🔽conditioned emptiness, the way of nonapprehending;🔽unconditioned emptiness, the way of nonapprehending;🔽emptiness beyond extremes, the way of nonapprehending;

original: dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: emptiness without beginning or end, the way of nonapprehending;

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness of nonrejection, the emptiness of nature, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of defining characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonthings, the emptiness of essence, and the emptiness of the essence of nonthings.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the four establishments of mindfulness in the manner of non-apprehension, the four right efforts in the manner of non-apprehension, the four legs of miraculous power in the manner of non-apprehension, the five faculties in the manner of non-apprehension, the five powers in the manner of non-apprehension,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul @493b dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul @493b dang /
translated: the seven aspects of enlightenment in the manner of non-apprehension, the noble eightfold path in the manner of non-apprehension, the four noble truths in the manner of non-apprehension, the four concentrations in the manner of non-apprehension, the four immeasurables in the manner of non-apprehension,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the four formless absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, and the three gateways to liberation,

original: mngon par shes pa lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the five kinds of supernatural knowledge, all the meditative stabilities, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four kinds of intrepid confidence,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the result of stream enterer,🔽the result of once-returner,🔽the result of non-returner,🔽the state of a worthy one,🔽a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol @494a *//🔽tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o // shes rab kyi pha rol @494a *// tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of giving is the forerunner in the completion of the perfection of giving by a bodhisattva mahāsattva who gives gifts through the method of non-apprehending of omniscience and the method of non-apprehending of all phenomena.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the forerunner in the completion of the perfection of morality by a bodhisattva mahāsattva who guards morality.🔽The perfection of wisdom is the forerunner in the completion of the perfection of patience by a bodhisattva mahāsattva who achieves patience.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the forerunner in the completion of the perfection of effort by a bodhisattva mahāsattva who makes effort.🔽The perfection of wisdom is the forerunner in the completion of the perfection of concentration by a bodhisattva mahāsattva who is concentrated.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of perseverance is the forerunner in perfecting the perfection of perseverance for a bodhisattva great being who is making an effort.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the forerunner in perfecting the perfection of meditative stabilization for a bodhisattva great being who is entering into meditative stabilization.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the forerunner in perfecting the perfection of wisdom for a bodhisattva great being who is looking at dharmas.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / dzambu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can /
analyzed: dper na / dzambu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can /
translated: for example, the trees in Jambudvīpa have various leaves,

original: me tog sna tshogs can /
analyzed: me tog sna tshogs can /
translated: various flowers,

original: 'bras bu sna tshogs can /
analyzed: 'bras bu sna tshogs can /
translated: various fruits,

original: dbyibs sna tshogs can /
analyzed: dbyibs sna tshogs can /
translated: various shapes,

original: chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang de dag gi gri ba ma la khyad par ram /
analyzed: chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang de dag gi gri ba ma la khyad par ram /
translated: Although they are arranged in various widths and depths, there is no difference in the size of the particles.🔽

original: bye brag mi dmigs te /
analyzed: bye brag mi dmigs te /
translated: although they are arranged in various widths and depths, no difference or🔽distinction is perceived in their wetness.

original: gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad do //
analyzed: gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad do //
translated: Otherwise, they would just be counted as shadows, shadows.

original: koo shi ka /🔽de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga @494b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la'ang khyad par ram /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga @494b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la'ang khyad par ram /
translated: Kauśika,

original: bye brag mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bye brag mi dmigs so //
translated: in the same way, no difference or distinction is perceived in the five perfections, which are embraced by the perfection of wisdom and dedicated to the wisdom of omniscience.

original: brgya byin gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: brgya byin gyis gsol pa /
translated: Śakra said:

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: the perfection of wisdom

analyzed: yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o //

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: the perfection of wisdom

analyzed: yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: the perfection of wisdom

original: yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Blessed One,🔽if a son of good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis /
translated: or a daughter of good family🔽were to write out this perfection of wisdom, make it into a book, carry it,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te bcangs ba dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te bcangs ba dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
translated: and honor it with flowers, garlands, incense, ointments, powders, clothes, parasols, victory banners,

original: ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis /
analyzed: ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis /
translated: and flags, and with various musical sounds,🔽and if they were to revere it,

analyzed: bkur stir bgyis / phu dud du bgyis /
translated: respect it,

original: mchod par bgyis te /
analyzed: mchod par bgyis te /
translated: and make offerings to it,

original: de nas gong du ji skad du bstan pa bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de nas gong du ji skad du bstan pa bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: and then, as previously explained, were to properly pay attention to the perfection of wisdom, and if another son of good family🔽or daughter of good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te gzhan la stsal na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te gzhan la stsal na /
translated: “Suppose, Bhagavān, that some sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage were to write out this perfection of wisdom in book form and give it to others,

original: de gnyis las gang gis bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' @495a *//
analyzed: de gnyis las gang gis bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' @495a *//
translated: which of the two would generate the greater merit?”

original: stsal pa / koo shi ka /
analyzed: stsal pa / koo shi ka /
translated: The Bhagavān replied, “Kauśika,

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: therefore,

original: khyod nyid la dris /
analyzed: khyod nyid la dris /
translated: I will ask you something in return.

original: khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig /
analyzed: khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig /
translated: You should give an answer according to your understanding.”

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think?🔽Suppose that some sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage were to honor many relics of the Tathāgata with flowers, incense, perfume,

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
translated: powders, clothing, parasols, victory banners, ribbons,

original: sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas /🔽bkur stir byas /
analyzed: sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas / bkur stir byas /
translated: and various musical sounds,

original: phu dud du byas /
analyzed: phu dud du byas /
translated: and were to revere, venerate, praise, and worship them,

original: mchod pa byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: mchod pa byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: and some other son of enlightened heritage or daughter of enlightened heritage were to write out this perfection of wisdom in book form, and give it to others,

original: rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te bgo bshar byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te bgo bshar byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: If a son or daughter of noble family were to give to others a relic of the Tathāgata the size of a mustard seed, and if they were to share it,🔽

original: rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po de blangs te me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po de blangs te me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
translated: If a son or daughter of noble family were to give to others a relic of the Thus-Gone One the size of a mustard seed, sharing it with others, and if another son or daughter of noble family were to take up a relic of the Thus-Gone One the size of a mustard seed and honor it with flowers, garlands, incense, ointments, powders, clothing, parasols, victory banners,

original: ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas /
analyzed: ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas /
translated: and flags, as well as various musical instruments,🔽honoring it,

original: bkur stir byas /🔽phu dud du byas /
analyzed: bkur stir byas / phu dud du byas /
translated: respecting it,

original: mchod par byas na /
analyzed: mchod par byas na /
translated: and making offerings to it,

original: de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin /
analyzed: de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin /
translated: which of them would generate greater merit?”

original: brgya byin gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: brgya byin gyis gsol pa /
translated: Śakra said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te /
analyzed: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te /
translated: I understand the meaning of what the Blessed One has said.🔽If a son or daughter of noble family were to give to others a relic of the Thus-Gone One the size of a mustard seed, sharing it with others, and if another son or daughter of noble family were to take up a relic of the Thus-Gone One the size of a mustard seed and honor it with flowers, garlands, incense, ointments, powders, clothing, parasols, victory banners,🔽and flags, as well as various musical instruments,🔽honoring it,🔽respecting it,🔽and making offerings to it,

original: de la rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de la rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: the latter would generate greater merit.

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos @495b dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos @495b dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
translated: “Son of noble family, if a son or daughter of noble family were to honor the many relics of the Tathāgata with flowers, garlands, incense, ointments, powders, clothing, parasols, victory banners, flags,

original: sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis /🔽bkur stir bgyis /🔽phu dud du bgyis /
analyzed: sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis / bkur stir bgyis / phu dud du bgyis /
translated: and various musical instruments,

original: mchod par bgyis pa bas /
analyzed: mchod par bgyis pa bas /
translated: and were to venerate, respect, revere, and worship them,

original: gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan la stsal na /
analyzed: gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan la stsal na /

original: 'di ni / de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo //
analyzed: 'di ni / de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo //
translated: the latter would generate merit that is much greater than the former.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste /
translated: the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, having seen this very meaning, entered the vajra-like absorption and then destroyed his vajra-like body.

original: sems can gyi ris na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje chen po bskyed de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so //
analyzed: sems can gyi ris na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje chen po bskyed de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so //
translated: For the sake of those beings in the realms of sentient beings who are to be trained by the relics of the Tathāgata, he generates great compassion and empowers the relics of the Tathāgata.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang la las chung du na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par bgyis na /
analyzed: gang la las chung du na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par bgyis na /
translated: those who make offerings to the relics of the Tathāgata, even as small as a mustard seed, with various offerings,

original: de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro //
translated: all of them, without reaching the end of that wholesome root, will put an end to suffering.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

analyzed: koo shi ka / de de bzhin no //
translated: Kauśika,🔽it is so,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is just as you have said.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: sons of good family or

translated: “If some son of a good family or daughter of a good family were to write out this perfection of wisdom, and to honor it with flowers, incense, perfumes, creams, powders, clothes, parasols, flags,🔽and banners,

analyzed: ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs @496a *// kyis rim gror byas / bkur stir byas / phu dud du byas /
translated: and with various musical sounds,🔽and to revere it,🔽to worship it,

analyzed: mchod pa byas pa bas /
translated: and to make offerings to it,

analyzed: gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te chos kyi dga' bas gzhan la byin na /

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas bsod nams cher 'phel te /

analyzed: de ni / ston pa yin par bsam mo //

analyzed: bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /

analyzed: gzhan / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /

analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa /

analyzed: ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab pas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab pas /
translated: It is by training in this very perfection of wisdom that the Tathagatas, Arhats, Fully Enlightened Ones of the past, future, and present have fully known, will fully know, and fully know the supreme enlightenment.🔽The Tathagatas, Arhats, Fully Enlightened Ones of the past, future, and present, also, O Lord, have trained in this very perfection of wisdom, will train in it, and do train in it, and thereby have fully known, will fully know, and fully know the supreme enlightenment.🔽The Tathagatas, Arhats, Fully Enlightened Ones of the past, future, and present, also, O Lord, have been led to the utmost right and perfect enlightenment by this very perfection of wisdom, will be led to it, and are led to it.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @496b byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @496b byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The Tathagatas, Arhats, Fully Enlightened Ones of the past, future, and present, also, O Lord, have been led to the utmost right and perfect enlightenment by this very perfection of wisdom, will be led to it, and are led to it.

original: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na med de /
analyzed: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na med de /
translated: And those who have gone forth from the home life into homelessness in the well-proclaimed Dharma and Vinaya, they also are not different from the irreversible Bodhisattvas.

original: de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: They too, having trained in this perfection of wisdom, fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽They fully awakened.

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will fully awaken.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab cing nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab cing nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo /
translated: those in the Śrāvaka Vehicle who have trained in this perfection of wisdom have attained the result of stream enterer,

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: attained, and will attain

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo //

analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: attained, and will attain

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo //
translated: the result of non-returner,

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro // dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo //
translated: attained, and will attain🔽the state of a worthy one,

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: attained, and will attain

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab cing rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab cing rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: The pratyekabuddha followers also trained in just this perfection of wisdom and fully awakened to their pratyekabuddha awakening.🔽They fully awakened.

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will fully awaken.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab cing /
