analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs so //
translated: and entered into the secure state of a bodhisattva.

original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //🔽bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon @497a *//
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon @497a *//
translated: They entered. They will enter.

original: par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: They fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽They fully awaken.

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will fully awaken.

original: ko shi ka /
analyzed: ko shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: therefore,

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: a son of a good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
translated: garlands, perfume, ointment,🔽powders, clothes, parasols, flags,

original: ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang / phu dud du bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang / phu dud du bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pas /
translated: and banners, and with various kinds of music,🔽should write out this perfection of wisdom, and honor,🔽revere, respect, and make offerings to it with flowers,🔽garlands, perfume, ointment,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o //🔽bkur stir bya'o //🔽phu dud du bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o // bkur stir bya'o // phu dud du bya'o //
translated: powders, clothes, parasols, flags,

original: mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: mchod par bya'o //
translated: and banners, and with various kinds of music.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste /
analyzed: ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste /
translated: I saw the very meaning of this and, having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, I thought,

original: gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas te brten cing rnam par spyad par bya snyam na /
analyzed: gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas te brten cing rnam par spyad par bya snyam na /
translated: ‘To whom should I pay homage, respect, reverence, and worship, and rely on and practice with?’

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa /
analyzed: de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa /
translated: in that regard, I did not see in the world with its gods,

original: bdud dang bcas pa /
analyzed: bdud dang bcas pa /
translated: with Māra, with Brahmā,

original: tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu dang / mi dang / lha @497b dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na de dang 'dra ba'am /
analyzed: tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu dang / mi dang / lha @497b dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na de dang 'dra ba'am /
translated: with śramaṇas and brahmins, with beings and gods, humans, and asuras, anyone like me,🔽or even superior to me.

original: lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te /
analyzed: lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te /
translated: Then I thought this:

original: de lta yin na /
analyzed: de lta yin na /
translated: ‘Since that is the case,

original: bdag gis chos zhi ba /
analyzed: bdag gis chos zhi ba /
translated: I will pay homage to the Dharma,🔽which is peaceful,

original: bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas te brten cing rnam par spyad par bya'o /
analyzed: bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas te brten cing rnam par spyad par bya'o /
translated: I should serve, venerate, respect, and make offerings to that very good buddhahood that I have realized myself, and I should rely on it and practice it.”

original: snyam du bsams so //
analyzed: snyam du bsams so //
translated: I should serve, venerate, respect, and make offerings to that very good buddhahood that I have manifested myself, and I should rely on it and practice it.”

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: chos de'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos de'ang gang zhe na /
translated: what is that Dharma?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te /
translated: this perfection of wisdom.

original: koo shi ka /🔽de ltar nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rim gror byed /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de ltar nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rim gror byed /
translated: Kauśika,

original: bkur stir byed /🔽phu dud du byed /🔽mchod par byed de /
analyzed: bkur stir byed / phu dud du byed / mchod par byed de /
translated: I too serve, venerate, respect, and make offerings to this very perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas shing rnam par spyod na /
analyzed: de ltar rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas shing rnam par spyod na /
translated: In that way, having served, venerated, respected, and made offerings, and having practiced,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas /
translated: if a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family wishes to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang /🔽bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lha ci smos /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lha ci smos /
translated: What need is there to mention that gods will honor, venerate, respect, and make offerings to this perfection of wisdom with flowers, incense, perfumes, flower garlands, creams, powders, clothing, parasols, flags, and banners, and with various musical sounds?🔽Those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage in the Vehicle of the Hearers and those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage in the Vehicle of the Solitary Realizers should also honor, venerate, respect, and make offerings to just this perfection of wisdom with flowers, incense,

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng @498a *//
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng @498a *//
translated: perfumes, flower garlands, creams, powders, clothing, parasols, flags, and banners, and with various musical sounds.

original: ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /
analyzed: ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /
translated: and with various kinds of incense, perfume, ointments, powders, clothes, parasols, victory banners, flags, and musical instruments,🔽

original: mchod par bya ba lta ci smos /
analyzed: mchod par bya ba lta ci smos /
translated: what need is there to speak of those who would honor, venerate, respect, and make offerings to them with flowers, incense, perfume, garlands, ointments, powders, clothing, parasols, flags, and banners, and with various kinds of music?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni /
translated: Why is that?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so //🔽byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so // byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni /
translated: Because the bodhisattva great beings have emerged from the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni /
translated: The tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas have emerged from the bodhisattvas.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so //
translated: The śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas have emerged from the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo'am /
translated: “Those sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle,

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
translated: those sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the Śrāvaka Vehicle,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
translated: and those sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the Pratyekabuddha Vehicle should honor this perfection of wisdom with flowers, incense, perfumes, flower garlands, creams, powders, clothing,

original: gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o //
analyzed: gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o //
translated: parasols, flags, and banners, and with various musical sounds.

original: bkur stir bya'o //🔽phu dud du bya'o //
analyzed: bkur stir bya'o // phu dud du bya'o //
translated: They should respect it,🔽should revere it,

original: mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: mchod par bya'o //
translated: should make offerings to it.

original: de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni /🔽bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽@498b mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // @498b mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: Those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who train like that🔽have fully awakened, will fully awaken, and are fully awakening to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They have honored, will honor, and are honoring the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo /
translated: The śrāvaka-vehicle practitioners also attain the state of an arhat.

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo //
translated: The followers of the Śrāvakayāna have attained, are attaining, and will attain arhatship.

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /🔽brgya byin gyi le'u ste /
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las / brgya byin gyi le'u ste /
translated: The followers of the Pratyekabuddhayāna have attained, are attaining, and will attain the awakening of a pratyekabuddha.🔽The followers of the Bodhisattvayāna have attained, are attaining, and will attain unsurpassed, complete awakening.”

original: nyi shu gnyis pa'o ////🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: nyi shu gnyis pa'o //// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa /
translated: This was the twenty-second chapter, “Śakra,” of “The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines.”

original: koo shi ka /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to Śatakratu, head of the gods, “Kauśika,

original: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gal te dzambu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gal te dzambu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na /
translated: if a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family were to establish the beings of Jambudvīpa in the ten wholesome actions,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think?

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram /
translated: Would that son of a good family or daughter of a good family generate a lot of merit?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: “Very much, Sugata!🔽Very much, Sugata!”

original: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: koo shi ka /🔽de bas kyang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de bas kyang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa'am /
translated: “Kauśika,🔽if someone else were to give this perfection of wisdom, in written form, to someone else, in order that it be read,

original: bri ba'am // kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: bri ba'am // kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: or to copy it, or to recite it,

original: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: then the merit would be much greater.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: And why?🔽Because in this perfection of wisdom the dharmas without outflows are taught, in which the sons and daughters of good family train, and have trained, and will train, and have entered, and are entering, and will enter into the secure state of a śrāvaka,

original: rigs kyi bu mo slob cing yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par @499a *//
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo slob cing yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par @499a *//
translated: and have attained, and are attaining, and will attain the fruit of a stream enterer, and have attained, and are attaining, and will attain the fruit of a once-returner, and have attained, and are attaining, and will attain the fruit of a non-returner, and have attained, and are attaining, and will attain the state of a worthy one, and have attained, and are attaining, and will attain a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, and have attained, and are attaining, and will attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'gyur ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: 'gyur ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the result of once-returner,🔽the result of non-returner,🔽the state of an arhat,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur ba dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur ba dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: and the pratyekabuddha’s enlightenment.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
translated: those who have entered into the secure state of a bodhisattva, those who will enter into it, those who are entering into it, those who have attained, those who will attain, and those who are attaining unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstan to //
translated: and those who have attained, those who will attain, and those who are attaining manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: zag pa med pa'i chos rgya cher bstan pa de dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos rgya cher bstan pa de dag gang zhe na /
translated: what are those extensive teachings on the uncontaminated doctrine?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po @499b stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po @499b stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom;🔽the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities, the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po @500a *//🔽dang / btang snyoms chen po dang 'di dag ni /

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will fully and completely awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na /
analyzed: sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na /
translated: if a son or daughter of noble family were to establish a single sentient being in the result of stream enterer,

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi /🔽dzambu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi / dzambu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni /
translated: the merit of the former would not even come close to a hundredth of the latter’s merit,

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: let alone the merit of establishing the sentient beings of Jambudvīpa in the ten virtuous actions.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni /
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni /
translated: sentient beings who have been established in the ten virtuous actions

original: sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no //
translated: have not been freed from the hells, the animal realms, and the world of Yama.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can ni /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can ni /
translated: sentient beings who have been established in the result of stream enterer

original: sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te /
translated: have been freed from the hells, the animal realms, and the world of Yama.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci smos /
translated: what need is there to speak of establishing them in the fruit of once-returner, the fruit of non-returner, or the state of arhat?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: gang la las dzambu'i gling gi sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / @500b lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas /
analyzed: gang la las dzambu'i gling gi sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / @500b lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas /
translated: if someone were to establish the sentient beings of Jambudvīpa in the fruit of stream enterer, in the fruit of once-returner, in the fruit of non-returner, and in the state of arhat,

original: la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang byang chub la bzhag na /
analyzed: la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang byang chub la bzhag na /
translated: and if someone else were to establish a single sentient being in solitary buddhahood,

original: 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: the latter would generate incalculably more merit than the former.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dzambu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa bas /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dzambu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa bas /
translated: if a son of enlightened heritage or daughter of enlightened heritage were to establish all the sentient beings of Jambudvīpa in solitary buddhahood,

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na /
translated: If some son of a good family or daughter of a good family were to establish a single sentient being in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: their merit would increase even more than that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sems can gcig po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni /
analyzed: sems can gcig po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni /
translated: Because establishing a single sentient being in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is the entrance into the aim of not cutting off the lineage of the buddhas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni /
translated: from bodhisattvas come

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so //
translated: stream enterers, once-returners, non-returners, worthy ones, and pratyekabuddhas.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni /
translated: from bodhisattvas come

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so //
translated: tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: For this reason,

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te /
translated: one should know that the bodhisattvas are to be worshipped and revered

original: 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa /
translated: by the world with its gods,

original: bdud dang bcas pa /
analyzed: bdud dang bcas pa /

analyzed: tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang / phreng ba dang / @501a *//

analyzed: koo shi ka /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dzambu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na /

translated: what do you think?

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
translated: Would that son of a good family or daughter of a good family on account of that root of merit generate a lot of merit?”

original: brgya byin gyis gsol ba /
analyzed: brgya byin gyis gsol ba /
translated: Śatakratu answered,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,🔽a lot!

original: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Well-Gone One,🔽a lot!”

original: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: koo shi ka /🔽de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bri ba'am /🔽bklag pa'am // kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bri ba'am / bklag pa'am // kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: even more than that, a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who writes out this perfection of wisdom and gives it to others to read and recite would generate a lot more merit.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te /🔽de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te / de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: Because in this perfection of wisdom the dharmas without outflows are taught in detail,

original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: and having trained in them, sons of a good family or daughters of a good family have entered into and are entering and will enter into the secure state,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained and are attaining and will attain the result of stream enterer,

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: have attained, will attain,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained the fruit of once-returning,

original: thob bo / 'thob @501b par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob @501b par 'gyur ro //
translated: will attain,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained the fruit of non-returning,

original: thob po // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob po // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: will attain,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained arhatship,

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to //
translated: will attain,🔽those in the Pratyekabuddha Vehicle have attained, will attain,

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: the individual enlightenment,🔽the Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas have entered, will enter,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: into the secure state,

original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: have attained, will attain,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i //
translated: supreme perfect enlightenment,🔽are attaining,

original: mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will attain,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /
translated: What are those uncontaminated phenomena?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: The perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs @502a *//
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs @502a *//
translated: the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless, the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-observation, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
analyzed: pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
translated: There are the four applications of mindfulness, the four correct exertions,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
translated: the four supports for miraculous abilities, the five powers, the five strengths, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths, the meditative stabilities, the immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
translated: the formless meditative stabilizations, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation,

original: mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
translated: the six clairvoyances, all the meditative stabilizations, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
translated: the great love, the great compassion, the great joy, and the great equanimity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
translated: The other boundless buddhadharmas are also taught in detail.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i @502b phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i @502b phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: for that reason, too, you should know that a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who, having made this perfection of wisdom into a book, gives it to others so that they read it, so that they learn it, so that they master it, so that they recite it, so that they write it,

original: de ni / bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni / bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o //
translated: generates even more merit.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
translated: all dharmas are taught in detail in this perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: Because of them, there are the great and high-status kṣatriya families.

original: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: There are the great and high-status brahmin families.

original: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: the great and high families of householders exist,

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Caturmaharajakayika gods exist,

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Trayastrimsa gods exist,

original: mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do //🔽dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do // dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Yamas gods exist,🔽the Tusitas gods exist,

original: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Nirmāṇarati gods exist,

original: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Paranirmitavaśavartin gods exist,

original: tshangs ris kye lha rnams yod do //🔽tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs ris kye lha rnams yod do // tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Brahmakayika gods exist,🔽the Brahmapurohita gods exist,

original: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Brahmapārṣadya gods exist,

original: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do //🔽snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do // snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Mahābrahma gods exist,

original: chung snang gi lha rnams yod do //🔽tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung snang gi lha rnams yod do // tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Parīttābha gods exist,🔽the Apramāṇābha gods exist,

original: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽chung dge'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do // dge ba'i lha rnams yod do // chung dge'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Ābhāsvara gods exist,🔽the Parīttaśubha gods exist,🔽the Apramāṇaśubha gods exist,

original: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Śubhakṛtsna gods exist,

original: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of Subhakrtsna,

original: che ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽chung che'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: che ba'i lha rnams yod do // chung che'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of Mahaggati,🔽the gods of Parittashubha,

original: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do // 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do // mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of Apramanashubha,🔽the gods of Shubhakrisna,🔽the gods of Avriha,

original: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do // shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of Atapa,🔽the gods of Sudarshana,

original: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of Sudarshana,

original: 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //🔽nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched @503a *//
analyzed: 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do // nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched @503a *//
translated: the gods of Akanishtha,

original: kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the sphere of infinite space,

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the sphere of infinite consciousness,

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the sphere of nothingness,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of generosity,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of morality,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the transcendent perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //🔽nang stong pa nyid yod do //🔽phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // nang stong pa nyid yod do // phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: and the transcendent perfection of wisdom.🔽“Here, Śāriputra, there is the emptiness of internal phenomena,🔽the emptiness of external phenomena,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of great extent,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of non-dispersal,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: and the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
translated: The applications of mindfulness exist.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //
translated: The right efforts exist.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do //🔽dbang po rnams yod do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do // dbang po rnams yod do //
translated: The legs of miraculous power exist.🔽The faculties exist.

original: stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: stobs rnams yod do //
translated: The powers exist.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag @503b rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag @503b rnams yod do //
translated: The branches of enlightenment exist.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //
translated: The noble eightfold path exists.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
translated: The noble truths exist.

original: bsam gtan rnams yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yod do //
translated: The meditative stabilizations exist.

original: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
translated: The immeasurables exist.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //
translated: The formless absorptions exist.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //
translated: The eight liberations exist.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //
translated: The nine serial absorptions exist.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do //

analyzed: koo shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na /

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /

analyzed: de ji snyam du sems /

analyzed: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom;🔽inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities, the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / @505a *//
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / @505a *//

original: dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
translated: the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
translated: the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation, the six clairvoyances, all the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
translated: all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, great love, great compassion,

original: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
analyzed: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
translated: great joy, and great equanimity,

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
translated: and he also extensively taught other limitless buddhadharmas.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika!

original: rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /🔽bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: For this reason, too, a son of good lineage or a daughter of good lineage who has written out this perfection of wisdom and🔽given it to others to read, to write, and to recite aloud🔽

analyzed: de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o //
translated: “Kauśika, for that reason you should know that a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who writes out this perfection of wisdom and gives it to others to read, to recite, to master, and to copy will have even more merit than that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: koo sha ka /
analyzed: koo sha ka /
translated: Kauśika,

analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /

analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //

analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //

analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: “The perfection of generosity exists,

original: tshul @506a *// khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: tshul @506a *// khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of moral discipline exists,🔽the perfection of patience exists,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of diligence exists,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of meditation exists,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //🔽nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // nang stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom exists.🔽“The emptiness of internal phenomena exists,

original: phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of external phenomena exists,🔽and

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of the external and the internal exists.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness exists.

original: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of the great exists.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate exists.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned exists.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned exists.🔽The emptiness of what is beyond extremes exists.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of the beginningless and endless exists.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of non-rejection exists.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence exists.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena exists.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of its own mark exists.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension exists.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of non-entity exists.🔽The emptiness of own-being exists.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of the non-entity of own-being exists.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do //🔽dbang po rnams yod do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do // dbang po rnams yod do //
translated: the bases of supernatural powers exist,🔽the faculties exist,

original: stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: stobs rnams yod do //
translated: the powers exist,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do //

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
translated: the noble truths exist,

original: bsam gtan rnams yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yod do //
translated: the meditative stabilities exist,

original: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
translated: the immeasurables exist,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //
translated: the formless meditative stabilizations exist,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //

analyzed: mthar gyis @506b gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do //
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors of liberation exist,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //
translated: the clairvoyances exist,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
translated: the meditative stabilizations exist,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways exist,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas exist,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do //
translated: the fearlessnesses exist,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges exist,🔽and

original: snying rje chen po rnams yod do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po rnams yod do //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the fruit of entering the stream,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
translated: arhatship,

original: rang byang chub yod do //
analyzed: rang byang chub yod do //
translated: individual enlightenment,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do //
translated: There are stream enterers,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do //
translated: there are once-returners,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //
translated: there are non-returners,

original: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //
translated: there are arhats,

original: rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: there are pratyekabuddhas,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do //
