analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: and there are tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika!

original: gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi /
analyzed: gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi /
translated: Let alone the sentient beings of a four-continent world system,

original: koo shi ka /🔽stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Kauśika,

original: rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na /🔽koo shi ka /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na / koo shi ka /
translated: if some son of a good family or daughter of a good family were to establish as many sentient beings as there are in a billion-world universe in the ten wholesome actions,

original: de ji snyam du sems /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: what do you think, Kauśika?

original: @507a *// rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
analyzed: @507a *// rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
translated: Would that son of a good family or daughter of a good family generate a lot of merit on that basis?”

original: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
analyzed: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
translated: it would be a lot. Blissful One, it would be a lot.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: koo shi ka /🔽de bas rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de bas rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: therefore, if some son of a good family or daughter of a good family were to give to others this perfection of wisdom in order to read it, to write it, and to recite it out loud,

original: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: he or she would generate a lot more merit.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te /
translated: it is because all the uncontaminated dharmas are taught in detail in this perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag la bslab cing /
analyzed: de dag la bslab cing /
translated: Having trained in them,

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: sons of a good family or

original: rigs kyi bu ma dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu ma dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: daughters of a good family have entered into the secure state.

original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: They have entered, they are entering, and they will enter.

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: They have attained, they are attaining, and they will attain the result of stream enterer.

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: They have attained, they are attaining, and they will attain the result of once-returner.

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro // dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //
translated: They have attained, they are attaining, and they will attain the result of non-returner.

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to //
translated: They have attained, they are attaining, and they will attain the state of a worthy one.

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: They have attained, they are attaining, and they will attain the state of a pratyekabuddha.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: and the bodhisattva mahāsattvas have entered into the secure state of a bodhisattva,

original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: are entering, and will enter,

original: bla na @507b med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: bla na @507b med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: have attained, are attaining, and will attain supreme perfect enlightenment,

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and have turned, are turning, and will turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste /
translated: what are those uncontaminated dharmas? They are as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i @508a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i @508a *//
translated: the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless

original: snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
translated: absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates of liberation, the clairvoyances,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rigs bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rigs bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang /
translated: all the meditative stabilizations, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, great love,

original: snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
translated: great compassion, great joy, and great equanimity,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
translated: and he also taught extensively other limitless buddhadharmas.

original: koo shi ka /🔽rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /🔽bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: koo shi ka / rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches med du 'phel bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches med du 'phel bar shes par bya'o //
translated: because of this one of many explanations, you should understand that a son of a good family or daughter of a good family who writes out this perfection of wisdom in book form and gives it to others to read and to write out and to recite from will have even more merit than that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las /
translated: It is because in this perfection of wisdom

original: chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
translated: all dharmas are taught in detail.

original: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing ma thob rnams yod do //
analyzed: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing ma thob rnams yod do //
translated: Because of their existence, there are great royal families,

original: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: great brahmin families,

original: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: great merchant families,

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //

analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yod do //

analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yod do //

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do //

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //

analyzed: snying rje chen po yod do //

analyzed: rang byang chub yod do //

analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do ////

analyzed: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das @510a *//

analyzed: kyis bka' stsal pa /

original: koo shi ka /

analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //

original: koo shi ka /

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven parts of awakening, the eightfold noble path, the four noble truths,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /🔽gzungs kyi @511a *//
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi @511a *//
translated: the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation, the six clairvoyances, all the meditative stabilizations,

original: sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
analyzed: sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
translated: all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, great love, and great compassion.

original: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
analyzed: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
translated: the great joy, and the great equanimity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
translated: The immeasurable buddhadharmas are also taught extensively.

original: koo shi ka /🔽rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka / rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Kauśika!

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: For this reason, a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who writes out this perfection of wisdom and makes a copy of it and gives it to someone else to read and to write out and to recite aloud,

original: de bas de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o /
analyzed: de bas de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o /
translated: should know that their merit increases even more than that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika!

original: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
translated: It is because all dharmas are taught extensively in this perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs tshe zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs tshe zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: Because of them, the high and mighty kṣatriya families exist.

original: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: The high and mighty brahmin families exist.

original: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: The high and mighty householder families exist.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Heaven of the Four Kings exist.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three exist.

original: mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do //🔽dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do // dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Yāma Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Tuṣita Heaven exist.

original: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do //🔽gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Nirmāṇarati Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Paranirmitavaśavartin Heaven exist.

original: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do //🔽tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do // tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Brahmākāyika Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Brahmapurohita Heaven exist.

original: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Brahmapārṣadya Heaven exist.

original: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod @511b do //🔽snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod @511b do // snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Mahābrahmāṇa Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Ābhāsvara Heaven exist.

original: chung snang gi lha rnams yod do //🔽tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung snang gi lha rnams yod do // tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Parīttābha Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Apramāṇābha Heaven exist.

original: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do // dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Ābhāsvara Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Śubhakṛtsna Heaven exist.

original: chung dge'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung dge'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Parīttaśubha Heaven exist.

original: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Apramāṇaśubha Heaven exist.

original: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //🔽che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //🔽che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Śubhakṛtsna Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Bṛhatphala Heaven exist.

original: chung che'i lha rnams yod do //🔽tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung che'i lha rnams yod do // tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Small and Great Pure Abodes.🔽There are gods of the Immeasurable Radiance.

original: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Vast Radiance.

original: mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Not Great.

original: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do // shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the No Heat.🔽There are gods of the Excellent Vision.

original: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Excellent Appearance.

original: 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Highest.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Sphere of Infinite Space.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Sphere of Infinite Consciousness.

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Sphere of Nothingness.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Sphere of Neither Perception nor Non-Perception.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: There is the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: There is the perfection of moral discipline.🔽There is the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: There is the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of meditative stability exists,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of wisdom exists,

original: nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: inner emptiness exists,

original: phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: outer emptiness exists,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: inner and outer emptiness exists,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of emptiness exists,

original: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: great emptiness exists,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: ultimate emptiness exists,🔽conditioned emptiness exists,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: unconditioned emptiness exists,🔽the emptiness of what is beyond extremes exists,

original: @512a *// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: @512a *// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of the unlimited exists,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of non-dispersal exists,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence exists,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of all things exists,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics exists,🔽the emptiness of non-apprehension exists,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of non-entities exists,🔽and

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of essential nature exists.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature exists.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things exists.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
translated: The applications of mindfulness exist.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //
translated: The right efforts exist.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do //🔽dbang po rnams yod do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do // dbang po rnams yod do //
translated: The legs of miraculous power exist.🔽The faculties exist.

original: stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: stobs rnams yod do //
translated: The powers exist.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do //
translated: The branches of enlightenment exist.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //
translated: The noble eightfold path exists.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
translated: The noble truths exist.

original: bsam gtan rnams yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yod do //
translated: The meditative stabilizations exist.

original: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
translated: The immeasurables exist.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //
translated: The formless absorptions exist.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //
translated: The eight liberations exist.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //
translated: The nine serial absorptions exist.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do //
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation exist.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //
translated: The superknowledges exist.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
translated: the meditative stabilities exist,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways exist,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas exist,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do //
translated: the fearlessnesses exist,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges exist,

original: snying rje chen po yod do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yod do //
translated: great compassion exists,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do //
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha exist.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i @512b 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i @512b 'bras bu yod do //
translated: The result of stream enterer exists,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the result of once-returner exists,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the result of non-returner exists,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
translated: the state of a worthy one exists,

original: rang byang chub yod do //
analyzed: rang byang chub yod do //
translated: solitary realizers’ enlightenment exists,

original: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yod do //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects exists,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects exists.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do //
translated: Stream enterers exist,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do //
translated: once-returners exist,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //
translated: non-returners exist,

original: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //
translated: worthy ones exist,

original: rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: solitary realizers exist,🔽and bodhisattvas exist.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do //
translated: the bodhisattva great beings exist,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: and the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas exist.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: stong gnyis pa'i 'jigs rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhig gi /
analyzed: stong gnyis pa'i 'jigs rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhig gi /
translated: let alone in a medium-sized world system of a billion worlds,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na /
translated: if some son of a good family or daughter of a good family were to establish all the sentient beings of a great billionfold world system in the ten wholesome actions,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ji snyam du sems /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems / rigs kyi bu'am /

original: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
translated: Would that son of a good family or daughter of a good family on account of that cause generate a lot of merit?”

original: gsal pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: gsal pa / bcom ldan 'das / mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: “Blessed One,🔽it would be a lot.🔽Well-Gone One, it would be a lot.”

original: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: de bas rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de bas rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: therefore, a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: “Kauśika, if a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family were to give this perfection of wisdom written out in book form to others so that they could read it and recite it,

original: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: their merit would increase much more.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /🔽de ni / 'di ltar shes @513a *//
analyzed: koo shi ka / de ni / 'di ltar shes @513a *//
translated: Kauśika,

original: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te /🔽de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te / de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: it is because in this perfection of wisdom the dharmas without outflows are taught in detail,

original: rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: and having trained in them sons of a good family or daughters of a good family have entered into perfect homelessness,

original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: are entering into perfect homelessness, and will enter into perfect homelessness;

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //🔽thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to // thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: have attained, are attaining, and will attain the result of stream enterer;

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //🔽thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to // thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: have attained, are attaining, and will attain the result of once-returner;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained, are attaining, and will attain the result of non-returner;

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: have attained, are attaining, and will attain the state of a worthy one;🔽have attained, are attaining, and will attain a pratyekabuddha’s awakening;🔽have attained, are attaining, and will attain unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //
translated: attained arhatship.

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to //
translated: attained, will attain.

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: Those in the Pratyekabuddha Vehicle attained, will attain, their pratyekabuddha enlightenment.

original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //🔽bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattvas entered, are entering, will enter into the secure state of a bodhisattva.

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They have attained, are attaining, will attain unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /
translated: what are those uncontaminated dharmas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha @513b rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha @513b rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom;🔽inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities, the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma @514a *//
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma @514a *//
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
analyzed: 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, great love, great compassion, great joy, and great equanimity,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
translated: and other limitless buddhadharmas have been extensively taught.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: because of this one of many explanations, you should know that a son of a good family or daughter of a good family who writes out the perfection of wisdom in book form and gives it to others to read and to write out and to recite aloud

original: de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should know that the merit is much greater.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
translated: it is because all dharmas are revealed in detail in this perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: Because of their existence, there are the great and high-ranking kṣatriyas.

original: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: There are the great and high-ranking brahmins.

original: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: There are the great and high-ranking householders.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are the Cāturmahā­rājika gods.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are the Trāyastriṃśa gods.

original: mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do //🔽dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do // dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are the Yāma gods.🔽There are the Tuṣita gods.

original: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do //🔽gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are the Nirmāṇarati gods.🔽There are the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin gods.

original: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do //🔽tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do // tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are the Brahmakāyika gods.🔽There are the Brahmapurohita gods.

original: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are the Brahmapārṣadya gods.

original: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do //🔽snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do // snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Mahābrahmā gods exist,🔽the Ābhāsvara gods exist,

original: chung snang gi lha rnams yod do //🔽tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung snang gi lha rnams yod do // tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Parīttābha gods exist,🔽the Apramāṇābha gods exist,

original: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽dge ba'i lha @514b rnams yod do //
analyzed: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do // dge ba'i lha @514b rnams yod do //
translated: the Ābhāsvara gods exist,🔽the Śubhakṛtsna gods exist,

original: chung dge'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung dge'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Parīttaśubha gods exist,

original: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Apramāṇaśubha gods exist,

original: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Śubhakṛtsna gods exist,🔽the Bṛhatphala gods exist,

original: che ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽chung che'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: che ba'i lha rnams yod do // chung che'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Parīttābha gods exist,🔽the Apramāṇābha gods exist,

original: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do // 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do // mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Apramāṇaśubha gods exist,🔽the Avṛha gods exist,

original: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do // shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Atapa gods exist,🔽the Sudarśana gods exist,

original: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do // 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Sudṛśa gods exist,🔽the Akaniṣṭha gods exist,

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the Ākāśānantyāyatana gods exist,

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the sphere of infinite consciousness,

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the sphere of nothingness,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of giving,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of morality,🔽the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: There is inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: there is outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: there is inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: there is the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: there is great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: there is ultimate emptiness,🔽there is the emptiness of the conditioned,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: and there is the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: “The emptiness of the unlimited exists.🔽“The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end exists.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: “The emptiness of non-rejection exists.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: “The emptiness of inherent existence exists.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //🔽rang gi @515a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do // rang gi @515a *//
translated: “The emptiness of all phenomena exists.

original: mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: “The emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics exists.🔽“The emptiness of non-apprehension exists.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: “The emptiness of non-entities exists.🔽“The emptiness of essential nature exists.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: “The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities exists.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
translated: “The applications of mindfulness exist.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //
translated: “The right efforts exist.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do //🔽dbang po rnams yod do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do // dbang po rnams yod do //
translated: “The legs of miraculous power exist.🔽“The faculties exist.

original: stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: stobs rnams yod do //
translated: “The powers exist.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do //
translated: “The branches of enlightenment exist.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //
translated: “The noble eightfold path exists.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
translated: “The noble truths exist.

original: bsam gtan rnams yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yod do //
translated: the meditative stabilities exist,

original: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
translated: the immeasurable aspirations exist,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //
translated: the formless meditative stabilizations exist,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //
translated: the eight deliverances exist,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //
translated: the nine serial steps of meditative absorption exist,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do //
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation exist,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //
translated: the clairvoyances exist,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
translated: the meditative stabilizations exist,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways exist,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas exist,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do //
translated: the fearlessnesses exist,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges exist,

original: snying rje chen po yod do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yod do //
translated: great compassion exists,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do //
translated: and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas exist.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: The result of stream enterer exists,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the result of once-returner exists,

original: phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the result of non-returner exists,🔽and

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
translated: there is the state of a worthy one;

original: rang byang chub yod do //

original: koo shi ka /

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom;

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa @516b nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa @516b nyid dang /
translated: inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / snon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / snon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
translated: the signless gate of liberation, the wishless gate of liberation, the six clairvoyances, all the meditative stabilizations, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, great love, great compassion, great joy, and great equanimity,

original: sangs @517a *// rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: sangs @517a *// rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
translated: and he also extensively taught other limitless buddhadharmas.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /

analyzed: rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /

analyzed: de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o //

translated: Kauśika,

analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /

analyzed: chung che'i lha rnams yod do // tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do //

analyzed: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do //

analyzed: mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do //

original: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do //

analyzed: shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do // gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do // 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the Sphere of Infinite Consciousness,

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //

analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of moral discipline exists,🔽the perfection of patience exists,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of diligence exists,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of meditation exists,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //🔽nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // nang stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom exists.🔽“The emptiness of internal phenomena exists,

original: phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of external phenomena exists,🔽and

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of the external and the internal exists.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //

original: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate exists.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned exists.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned exists.🔽The emptiness of what is beyond extremes exists.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of the beginningless and endless exists.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of non-rejection exists.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence exists.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena exists.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of its own mark exists.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension exists.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽ngo bo nyid @518a *//🔽stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do // ngo bo nyid @518a *// stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of non-things exists.🔽The emptiness of essential nature exists.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things exists.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
translated: The applications of mindfulness exist.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //
translated: The right efforts exist.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do //🔽dbang po rnams yod do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do // dbang po rnams yod do //
translated: the bases of spiritual power exist,🔽the faculties exist,

original: stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: stobs rnams yod do //
translated: the powers exist,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do //
translated: the branches of enlightenment exist,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //
translated: the noble eightfold path exists,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
translated: the noble truths exist,

original: bsam gtan rnams yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yod do //
translated: the meditative stabilities exist,

original: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
translated: the immeasurables exist,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //
translated: the formless meditative stabilizations exist,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //
translated: the eight deliverances exist,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //
translated: the nine serial meditative stabilizations exist,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do //
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors of liberation exist,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //
translated: the clairvoyances exist,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
translated: the meditative stabilizations exist,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways exist,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas exist,

original: mi 'jigs ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs ba rnams yod do //
translated: the fearlessnesses exist,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges exist,🔽and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha exist.

original: snying rje chen po yod do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yod do //
translated: “There is great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do //
translated: “There are the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: “There is the fruit of entering the stream.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: “There is the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: “There is the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
translated: “There is arhatship.

original: rang byang chub yod do //
analyzed: rang byang chub yod do //
translated: “There is individual enlightenment.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do //
translated: “There is the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa rnams @518b yod do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do // rgyun du zhugs pa rnams @518b yod do //
translated: “There is the knowledge of all aspects.🔽“There are those who have entered the stream.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do // phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //
translated: “There are those who are tied to one more rebirth.🔽“There are those who are no longer subject to rebirth.

original: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //
translated: “There are arhats.

original: rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do /
translated: “There are pratyekabuddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do //
translated: “There are bodhisattva great beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: “There are tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: gzhan yang dzambu'i gling gi mi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: gzhan yang dzambu'i gling gi mi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Moreover, Kauśika, suppose that some son of a good family or🔽daughter of a good family were to establish as many beings as there are in

original: rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de /
translated: the billion-world cosmic system in the four meditative concentrations,

original: tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na /🔽koo shi ka /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na / koo shi ka /
translated: in the four formless absorptions, and in the five kinds of supernormal knowledge.

original: de ji snyam du sems /🔽rigs kyi bu 'am /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems / rigs kyi bu 'am /
translated: What do you think, Kauśika?🔽Would the merit of that son of a good family or daughter of a good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
translated: be great on the strength of that?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Blessed One,

original: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: it would be great, Sugata.

original: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Blessed One said,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: de bas rigs kyi bu'am /🔽rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: de bas rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: therefore, a son of a good family or daughter of a good family

original: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: who gives this perfection of wisdom to others to read and to write and to recite aloud will have merit that increases much more than that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te /🔽de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te / de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: It is because in this perfection of wisdom the dharmas of no more learning are shown in detail.

original: rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: Having trained in them, sons and daughters of good family have entered into perfect errorlessness.

original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: They are entering, will enter.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //🔽thob @519a *// bo /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to // thob @519a *// bo /
