original: 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: They have attained, will attain.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: They have attained the fruit of once-returner.

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: They have attained, will attain.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: They have attained the fruit of non-returner.

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: They have attained, will attain.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //
translated: They have attained the state of a worthy one.

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: They have attained, will attain.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to //
translated: Those in the vehicle of the solitary buddhas have attained their awakening.

original: thob po // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob po // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: They have attained, will attain.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: and the bodhisattva mahāsattvas have entered into the secure state of a bodhisattva,

original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: are entering, and will enter,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: have attained, are attaining, and will attain supreme perfect enlightenment,

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and have turned, are turning, and will turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /
translated: what are those uncontaminated dharmas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom;

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa @519b nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa @519b nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven parts of awakening, the eightfold noble path, the four noble truths,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
translated: the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation, the six clairvoyances, all the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
translated: all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, great love, and great compassion,

original: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
analyzed: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
translated: the great joy, and the great equanimity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
translated: The immeasurable buddhadharmas are also taught extensively.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika!

original: rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: For this reason, a son of a good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha @520a *//
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha @520a *//
translated: a daughter of a good family

original: ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: who has written out this perfection of wisdom in book form and given it to others to read, to write, and to recite aloud,

original: de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes bar bya'o //
translated: should know that their merit increases even more than that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika!

original: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
translated: It is because all dharmas are taught extensively in this perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: Because of their existence, there are the great and high-ranking kṣatriyas.

analyzed: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //

analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //

analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Heaven of the Four Kings exist.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three exist.

original: mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do //🔽dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do // dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Yāma Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Tuṣita Heaven exist.

original: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do //🔽gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //

original: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do //🔽tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do // tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Brahmā group exist.🔽The gods of the Brahmapurohita group exist.

original: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Brahmakāyika group exist.

original: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do //🔽snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do // snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Mahābrahmā group exist.🔽The gods of the Ābhāsvara group exist.

original: chung snang gi lha rnams yod do //🔽tshad med snang ba'i rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung snang gi lha rnams yod do // tshad med snang ba'i rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Parīttābha group exist.🔽The gods of the Apramāṇābha group exist.

analyzed: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do // dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Ābhāsvara group exist.🔽The gods of the Śubhakṛtsna group exist.

original: chung dge'i lha rnams yod do //🔽tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung dge'i lha rnams yod do // tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Parīttaśubha group exist.🔽The gods of the Apramāṇaśubha group exist.

original: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //🔽che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //🔽che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Śubhakṛtsna group exist.🔽The gods of the Bṛhatphala group exist.

original: chung che'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung che'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm.🔽There are gods of the Trāyastriṃśa realm.🔽There are gods of the Yāma realm.

original: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do // 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do // mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Tuṣita realm.🔽There are gods of the Nirmāṇa­rata realm.

original: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do // shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin realm.🔽There are gods of the Brahmakāyika realm.

original: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do // 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Brahmapurohita realm.🔽There are gods of the Brahmapārṣadya realm.🔽There are gods of the Parīttābha realm.

original: nam @520b mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //🔽rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: nam @520b mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do // rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Apramāṇābha realm.

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Ābhāsvara realm.🔽There are gods of the Parīttaśubha realm.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Apramāṇaśubha realm.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: There is the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: There is the perfection of moral discipline.🔽There is the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: There is the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of meditative stability exists,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of wisdom exists,

original: nang stong pa nyid yod do /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yod do /
translated: inner emptiness exists,

original: phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: outer emptiness exists,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: inner and outer emptiness exists,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of emptiness exists,

original: chen po stong pa nyid yod do /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yod do /
translated: great emptiness exists,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: ultimate emptiness exists,🔽conditioned emptiness exists,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: unconditioned emptiness exists,🔽the emptiness of beyond extremes exists,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of that which has no beginning or end exists,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of nonrepudiation exists,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence exists,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena exists,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics exists,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of nonapprehension exists,🔽the emptiness of nonentities exists,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: and the emptiness of essential nature exists.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: The emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature exists.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
translated: The applications of mindfulness exist.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //
translated: The right efforts exist.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do //🔽dbang po rnams yod do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do // dbang po rnams yod do //
translated: The legs of miraculous power exist.🔽The faculties exist.

original: stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: stobs rnams yod do //
translated: The powers exist.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do //
translated: The branches of enlightenment exist.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //
translated: The noble eightfold path exists.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
translated: The noble truths exist.

original: @521a *// bsam gtan rnams yod do //
analyzed: @521a *// bsam gtan rnams yod do //
translated: The meditative stabilizations exist.

original: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
translated: The immeasurables exist.

original: gzugs bed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzugs bed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //
translated: The formless meditative stabilizations exist.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //
translated: The eight deliverances exist.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //
translated: The nine serial meditative stabilizations exist.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do //
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation exist.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //
translated: The clairvoyances exist.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
translated: The meditative stabilizations exist.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways exist,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas exist,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do //
translated: the fearlessnesses exist,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges exist,

original: snying rje chen po yod do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yod do //
translated: great compassion exists,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do //
translated: the distinct attributes of a buddha exist,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the result of stream enterer exists,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the result of once-returner exists,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the result of non-returner exists,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
translated: the state of a worthy one exists,

original: rang byang chub yod do //
analyzed: rang byang chub yod do //
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening exists,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects exists,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects exists.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do //
translated: There are stream enterers,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do //
translated: there are once-returners,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //
translated: there are non-returners,

original: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //
translated: there are worthy ones,

original: rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: there are pratyekabuddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do //
translated: and there are bodhisattva great beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas exist.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: gzhan yang dzambu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi /
analyzed: gzhan yang dzambu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi /
translated: never mind the sentient beings of Jambudvīpa,

original: koo shi ka /🔽gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams @521b kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams @521b kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Kauśika,

original: rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na /🔽koo shi ka /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na / koo shi ka /
translated: if some son of enlightened heritage or daughter of enlightened heritage were to establish in the four meditative concentrations and four formless absorptions as many sentient beings as there are sentient beings in a four-continent world system, and were to establish them in the five kinds of superknowledge,

original: de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think, Kauśika?

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
translated: Would the merit of that son of enlightened heritage or daughter of enlightened heritage be great thereby?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: it would be great, Sugata!”

original: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: Therefore, if a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family gives to others the book of this perfection of wisdom for reading, for writing, for reciting,🔽

original: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: Therefore, Kauśika, a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who gives a copy of this perfection of wisdom to others to read, to write, and to recite would have even more merit.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te /
translated: it is because in this perfection of wisdom the dharmas without outflows are taught extensively,

original: de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: and having trained in them, sons of a good family or daughters of a good family have entered into perfect homelessness,

original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: are entering, and will enter;

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained, are attaining, and will attain the result of stream enterer;

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: have attained, are attaining, and will attain the result of once-returner;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained, are attaining, and will attain the result of non-returner;

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: have attained, will attain,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained the state of an arhat,

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to //
translated: will attain,🔽the pratyekabuddhas have attained, will attain,

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur @522a *//
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur @522a *//
translated: their own awakening,🔽and the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas have entered, will enter,

original: ro // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: ro // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: the secure state of a bodhisattva,

original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: will enter,
